## FormStateProxy type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type FormStateProxy<TFieldValues extends FieldValues = FieldValues> = {
    isDirty: boolean;
    isValidating: boolean;
    dirtyFields: FieldNamesMarkedBoolean<TFieldValues>;
    touchedFields: FieldNamesMarkedBoolean<TFieldValues>;
    errors: boolean;
    isValid: boolean;
};
```
